titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 67 Castle Street in Geneva, New York, as the "Corporal Steven Blaine Riccione Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

action.text: Mr. Lankford moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 2244.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Lankford objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 418 - 1, 1 Present (Roll no. 674).

action.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Reported by Senator Lieberman without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 375.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

committee.subcommittee: Federal Financial Management, Government Information, Federal Services, and International Security
committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 5/15/2012--Public Law. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 67 Castle Street in Geneva, New York, as the "Corporal Steven Blaine Riccione Post Office."
